info.description:
This is something with substance to add to the shrink interactive list, a classic type story. It is classic because it has no, stupid celebrities, television, cartoon, game or familiar famous story characters, plus no gross M/M. Just, good old-fashioned female eating. Everything a true shrink story enthusiast will love, except there is no giantess/shrunken guy interaction. I will be putting up another classic story that has that, sometime soon.

Follow the stories of either Jason Cook or Amanda Baker. Their storylines are separate unless I make them converge.
Both of them had once worked at a scientific testing facility where there was an accident and they both were exposed to some kind of gas. After they showed no signs of having been harmed by it, they both were told that they didn’t have to come to work anymore. They were informed that they would be paid double what they were normally paid a year, for the rest of their lives. All they had to do was never to speak of the accident to anyone.

A few weeks later, both of them found out that they have the power to shrink things. Eventually they started shrinking girls and young women and started eating them, they didn’t know why, but they just had the urge to eat girls and young women.

Rules: Follow them perfectly; I will delete editions that break them.

1.) No guys, besides Jason. Basically, none of the bad things listed in the second line of the first paragraph at the top.
2.) The girls and women, who are introduced into the story, are to be between the ages of 16 and 34, no younger and no older.
3.) The size limits of the shrunken girls and women: 3 inches to 20 inches. Jason and Amanda can turn the girls and women back to normal if they want, or also change the size of the girls and women as long as it is between the size limit. And by no means can Jason and Amanda be shrunk, the are the only ones with the power.
4.) Ways the shrunken girls and women can die.
In Jason’s care: Eaten by chewed or swallowed whole. Put in food and eaten; like a sandwich. Cooked then eaten.
In Amanda’s care: Same as with Jason, but add to the list; sat on, and being used for sexual purposes (in between her legs). Only in her womanhood. No sticking them in her ass.
5.) Also, if a girl or woman is put into food or cooked, there is to be no meat of any kind, because the idea is that they are the meat.
6.) No animals, bugs, or insects of any kind.
7.) Use correct punctuation and grammar. Use a spell checker to check the work before adding. Preferably use a spell checker from a word processing program, not the site’s spell checker.
8.) Editions must be at least six good sentences long. (A normal paragraph) But I would prefer longer, I want some thought put into the work you add. Like the long editions I make.
9.) If you write dialogue, this is how it is to be punctuated.
Example.1: “You are going to be tasty,” Jason said.
Or.
Example.2: “Come here sweetie,” Amanda said, “My belly is waiting to meet you.”
10.) Editions are to be written in the third person perspective.
Example: Jason shrunk the girl and put her in the pantry for later.
